nodes.text: The Droid ReServe was a droid remainder reseller that sold inventory from Serv-O-Droid after the company was liquidated by the Corporate Sector Authority. The reseller was located on Elshandruu Pica and had millions of new droids in its inventory. For years after the liquidation of Serv-O-Droid, the Droid ReServe continued to produce the company's droids and replacement parts.
